name: First Hope
description:
First Hope is a pixel art style game made for fun in Python using pyGame

Destroy enemy ships to collect data samples that contribute towards decrypting the space logs that reveal the game's story. (The game story isn't very long, interesting, or original but I think it's pretty cool lol)

If u have any suggestions please put them in the comments. I am looking mainly for game logic suggestions such as the player velocity or enemy spawn frequency and any bugs you may find, but please feel free to comment anything!

Have Fun!

Make sure to read the install instructions!
